gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 117, Clippers 106
gameRecap.excerpt: New Orleans win their 4th straight game as they defeat Los Angeles, 117-106. For New Orleans, CJ McCollum led the way with 25 points (five 3PM), seven rebounds, and four assists while Zion Williamson notched the double-double with 21 points and 10 assists. James Harden led the way with 19 points, eight rebounds, and five assists aided by Norman Powell tallying 18 points for Los Angeles in the losing effort. New Orleans wins and improves to 30-21, while Los Angeles moves to 34-16 in the loss.
